Agi.effect: Light fire damage to one target.

Agidyne.effect: Heavy fire damage to a near target.

Astral Burst.effect: Inflicts super almighty damage to all enemies.

Bane Shot.effect: Super gun damage to target, will bind if weak to Death.

Berserker.effect: Light physical damage + rage to a nearby enemy.

Blast Shot.effect: Super gun damage to target, will impede if weak to Force.

Blaze.effect: Moderate fire damage to all enemies hit.

Bolt Storm.effect: Light electric damage to target, Sluggish for a short time

Bufu.effect: Light ice damage to one target.

Bufudyne.effect: Heavy ice damage to target, splash damage to enemies nearby.

Cocytus.effect: Light ice damage to target, Sluggish for a short time

Combo.effect: Repeated attacks to nearby enemy for light physical damage.

Cross Slash.effect: Inflicts super physical damage to all enemies on four straight lines from where power is used.

Curse.effect: Chance of returning damage to attacker.

Devotion.effect: Demon gains loyalty at almost twice the normal rate.

Dia.effect: Recovers a small amount of HP.

Diarama.effect: Recovers a moderate amount of HP.

Dormina.effect: Light mind damage + sleep to all enemies in radius.

Elec Boost.effect: Grants a boost to electric type damage.

Elec Drain.effect: Raidou and demon will drain electric attacks for the duration.

Elec Resist.effect: Reduces electric damage taken by half. Cancels Weak vs. Elec.

Endure.effect: High chance to survive fatal attacks with 1 HP remaining, once per battle.

Fiery Spiral.effect: Super physical damage to target, will burn if weak to Fire.

Fire Boost.effect: Grants a boost to fire type damage.

Fire Breath.effect: Heavy fire damage to all in the straight line.

Fire Drain.effect: Raidou and demon will drain fire attacks for the duration.

Fire Resist.effect: Reduces fire damage taken by half. Cancels Weak vs. Fire.

Fireball.effect: Super fire damage to all enemies in straight line.

First Aid.effect: The demon and Raidou will recover all HP after the fight ends.

Flame Shot.effect: Super gun damage to target, will burn if weak to Fire.

Flurry.effect: Moderate force damage to all enemies hit.

Fly.effect: Allows a demon to access unreachable areas

Force Boost.effect: Grants a boost to force type damage.

Force Drain.effect: Raidou and demon will drain force attacks for the duration.

Force Resist.effect: Reduces force damage taken by half. Cancels Weak vs. Force.

Freeze Shot.effect: Super gun damage to target, will freeze if weak to ice.

Frenzy.effect: Causes light physical damage to all enemies around demon.

Frigid Spin.effect: Super physical damage to target, will freeze if weak to ice.

Frostbite.effect: Moderate ice damage to all enemies hit.

Frozen Lance.effect: Super ice damage to all enemies in straight line.

Gale Slash.effect: Super physical damage to target, will impede if weak to Force.

Glacial Blast.effect: Heavy ice damage to all in the straight line.

Heal Boost.effect: Demons recovery type spells are 50% more effective.

Hellfire.effect: Light fire damage to target, Sluggish for a short time

Hero's Might.effect: Moderate chance for the demon to double attack power for the current battle.

Hex.effect: High chance to return half the damage taken to the attacker.

Hurricane.effect: Super force damage to all enemies in straight line.

Ice Boost.effect: Grants a boost to ice type damage.

Ice Drain.effect: Raidou and demon will drain ice attacks for the duration.

Ice Resist.effect: Reduces ice damage taken by half. Cancels Weak vs. Ice.

Ignite.effect: Makes people talk, sets some objects on fire.

Item Find.effect: Demon will find items after battle more often.

Life Bonus.effect: Will increase the demons maximum HP by 10%

Life Gain.effect: Will increase the demons maximum HP by 20%

Life Surge.effect: Will increase the demons maximum HP by 30%

Mabufu.effect: Moderate ice damage to all in radius.

Mabufudyne.effect: Heavy ice damage to all in radius.

Mage's Craft.effect: Moderate chance for the demon to double magic power for the current battle.

Makajam.effect: Light mind damage + mute to target.

Makakaja.effect: Lowers magical damage until the end of the battle.

Makara Aura.effect: Raises all allies magical defense until the end of the battle.

Mamudo.effect: HP of all enemies near demon are halved.

Mana Bonus.effect: Will increase the demons maximum MP by 10%

Mana Gain.effect: Will increase the demons maximum MP by 20%

Mana Surge.effect: Will increase the demons maximum MP by 30%

Maragi.effect: Moderate fire damage to all in radius.

Maragidyne.effect: Heavy fire damage to all in radius.

Marin Karin.effect: Light mind damage + charm to all enemies in radius.

Mazan.effect: Moderate force damage to all in radius.

Mazandyne.effect: Heavy force damage to all in radius.

Mazio.effect: Moderate electric damage to all in radius.

Maziodyne.effect: Heavy electric damage to all in radius.

Media.effect: Raidou and all allies recover a small amount of HP.

Mighty Blow.effect: Moderate physical damage + rage to nearby enemy.

Mind Boost.effect: Improves the chance of status ailments effecting the enemies.

Money Find.effect: Demon will find extra money after battles.

Null Death.effect: Raidou and demon will null death attacks for the duration.

Null Elec.effect: Raidou and demon will null electric attacks for the duration.

Null Fire.effect: Raidou and demon will null fire attacks for the duration.

Null Force.effect: Raidou and demon will null force attacks for the duration.

Null Ice.effect: Raidou and demon will null ice attacks for the duration.

Null Mind.effect: Raidou and demon will null mind attacks for the duration.

Null Phys.effect: Raidou and demon will null physical attacks for the duration.

Patra.effect: Target recovers from all mind-type status ailments.

Petra.effect: Light mind damage + stone to all enemies in line with demon.

Phys Drain.effect: Raidou and demon will drain physical attacks for the duration.

Phys Resist.effect: Reduces physical damage taken by half. Cancels Weak vs. Physical.

Pulinpa.effect: Light mind damage + mute to target.

Quick Study.effect: Demon will gain almost double experience after battles.

Rakukaja.effect: Lowers damage received until the end of the battle.

Regenerate.effect: The demon and Raidou recover HP every few seconds in combat.

Retribution.effect: High chance to deal heavy Almighty damage to enemies in a radius when demon dies.

Rush.effect: Inflicts super physical damage to all enemies in a straight line from the demon, moves demon along the path.

Scavenger.effect: Has a chance to obtain items

Scout.effect: Search the area for enemies and items

Shock Shot.effect: Super gun damage to target, will shock if weak to Electric.

Shock Wave.effect: Heavy electric damage to all in the straight line.

Sneak.effect: Allows a demon to access unreachable areas

Spark.effect: Moderate electric damage to all enemies hit.

Tarukaja.effect: Raises allies physical attack until the end of the battle.

Tempest.effect: Light force damage to target, Sluggish for a short time

Tetra Aura.effect: Raises all allies physical defense until the end of the battle.

Thunderbolt.effect: Super electric damage to all enemies in straight line.

Venomstrike.effect: Causes light physical damage + poison to a nearby enemy.

Vile Storm.effect: Super physical damage to target, will bind if weak to Death.

Voltaic Ring.effect: Super physical damage to target, will shock if weak to Electric.

War Cry.effect: Raises all allies attack until the end of the battle.

Wind Cutter.effect: Heavy force damage to all in the straight line.

Winged Fury.effect: Hits enemy with thrown weapon for light physical damage, chance to knock enemy down.

Zan.effect: Light force damage to one target.

Zandyne.effect: Heavy force damage to target, splash damage to enemies nearby.

Zio.effect: Light electric damage to one target.

Ziodyne.effect: Heavy electric damage to target, splash damage to enemies nearby.
